sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_metadata_link"><sys_metadata_link action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><directory>update</directory><documentkey>04538f8ddb84ec5094ea6693ca9619b0</documentkey><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_stave_sc_form_header_action">
    <x_stave_sc_form_header_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <condition_script><![CDATA[/*
Condition script is the script that controls if the action should be displayed or not. 
    Set answer = true to display the action, answer = false to disclude the action. 

    Avaliable variables: 
        current = GlideRecord object of the current record 
        page = the current page
        view = the current view
*/
answer=new x_stave_sc.BlanketPO(current).showSendDraft();]]></condition_script>
        <execution_script><![CDATA[/*
Execution script is the script that is run when executing the action.
    For redirect set the variables:
        answer = {};
        answer.page =  the page param for the URL
        answer.table =  the table param for the URL
        answer.sys_id = the sys id param for the URL
        answer.refVal = the referringValue for the URL, this should typically be set to the display value of the current record;
        answer.redirect = true;
         An example for showing a widget 
         answer = {};
         answer.widget_options={}; 
         answer.widget = true;
         answer.widget_id='stv-sc-receiving-order';
         answer.widget_options.sys_id= current.sys_id.toString();
         answer.widget_options.field_list = "product_name,quantity,received_quantity";

For any other actions the answer variable does not need to be set.

    Avaliable variables: 
        current = GlideRecord object of the current record 
        page = the current page 
        view = the current view
*/
new x_stave_sc.BlanketPO(current).changeState([{"status":"0"},{"active":false}]);
new x_stave_sc.BlanketPO(current).sendToDraft();
current.update();]]></execution_script>
        <icon/>
        <name>Send to Draft</name>
        <order>0</order>
        <req_confirm>false</req_confirm>
        <req_refresh>false</req_refresh>
        <sys_created_by>bryan.Villa</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-10-22 20:10:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>04538f8ddb84ec5094ea6693ca9619b0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>bryan.Villa</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-10-22 20:10:01</sys_updated_on>
        <table display_value="Blanket PO" name="x_stave_sc_blanket_po">b62a0b0bdbce7700f99a41deaa96198d</table>
        <workflow_action>true</workflow_action>
    </x_stave_sc_form_header_action>
</record_update>
